To config your CL dataset for the experiment, specify the `cl_dataset` field in the main YAML file. Always point to sub YAML file in the directory [configs/cl_dataset/], where the `_target_` field is set as `clarena.cl_datasets.your dataset`


# Supported Dataset List {#list}

Here is a full list. To choose a dtaset, Simply substitute `your_dataset` above with the module name below.

| CL Dataset  |   Module Name | Description       |
| :----------------------------------------------------------- |:----------------------------------------------------------- |
| Permuted MNIST  | PermutedMNIST | A [MNIST](http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/) variant for CL by random permutation of the input pixels to form differenet tasks   |
| Split MNIST |SplitMNIST | A MNIST variant for CL by spliting the dataset by class to form different tasks |
| Permuted CIFAR10 |         | A [CIFAR](https://www.cs.toronto.edu/~kriz/cifar.html)-10 permuted variant for CL.   |
| Split CIFAR100 |       | A CIFAR-100 split variant for CL.  |
